snippet: In a wide-ranging article in Vogue magazine, the former first daughter Chelsea Clinton discussed how she was embracing the political legacy handed down from her parents.
abstract: In a wide-ranging article in Vogue magazine, the former first daughter Chelsea Clinton discussed how she was embracing the political legacy handed down from her parents.

headline.main: Chelsea Clinton Does Not Rule Out Run for Office
headline.print_headline: The Next Generation: A Clinton Leaves the Door Open
